name: CCH Marketing
description:
CCH Marketing is a digital marketing, public relations, advertising and social media firm.  We represent clients across a broad range of industries, including healthcare, hospitality, and architecture, design and construction.  Our team of professionals learns your business from the inside out, developing your voice and delivering meaningful communications that move the meter with your intended audience.
 From upper-level consulting to full-on campaign management and execution, we have the expertise and resources to deliver real results that show on the bottom line. We are a Google partner. Minority and woman owned.
READ MORE...
